'''Hob "Old Gammidgy" Gammidge''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Hob was the son of [[Wiseman Gamwich]]. He made his living as a roper in [[Tighfield]],<ref>{{TT|Taming}}</ref> a tradition which was passed along to his son [[Hobson]] and his grandson, [[Andwise Roper|Andy]], who adopted the surname [[Roper family|Roper]]. 

Hob was married to [[Rowan]], the daughter of [[Holman the greenhanded|Holman the Greenhanded]]. Their son Hobson was born in {{SR|1285}}.<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>
